_sText:
Sliderace_499_short
_________________________

This is the first and short Public Version of the slidemap "sliderace_499"
I will upload another longer Version of the map !
_________________________

Specifications:
Players: 2-28
Slide-Duration: 30-35
Texture: Aim-Style

Special features:
- AFK-Protection (v.1.1)
- The Map automatically restict waepons (exept Knife)
- Ts and CTs slide separated to begin 
_________________________

Good Luck and have Fun with the Map ;)
_________________________

by Curry
